title: Drawing
medium: Brush and gray and white wash on paper
inscribed: Verso: In pen and black ink: Vaccaro; in pen and brown ink: No.48 / D.5 / 163
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Saint Gennaro at center, it flying over Mount Vesuvius with winged putti around him.  The putto above him is holding his robe, the putto to the bottom right is holding a book, and the one to the bottom left is holding his crozier.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
Brush and gray and white wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7285.
